title: Club problems
body:
Hi rioters,
Since you guys re-enabled the clubs, I can't see my club in the ''club and chat room'', my club chatroom or my tag in game. It is as if I'm not in the club anymore. What is really weird is that my friends still see's me as the moderator of the club even though I feel I'm not in it anymore. Can anyone help me?

replies.body: I have the same problem, I created the club and invited people now Im the only one that is not in the club...

This issue and a few others have been reported since the clubs were re-enabled, as you mentioned.  I don't have any updates on a fix, but our clubs team is [working on a solution](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  They'll be aiming to get all this fixed up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VUfmZgK1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T18:20:30.350+0000)
>
> This issue and a few others have been reported since the clubs were re-enabled, as you mentioned.  I don't have any updates on a fix, but our clubs team is [working on a solution](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  They'll be aiming to get all this fixed up!

Can you not put up a little diamond again and show that its still an issue? I had to go searching everywhere to find out it wasnt my client after reinstalling the game twice.
